name: Spooky Scary Settlement
description: Our first assignment this year, we have to produce a text adventure game of a characters journey to enter a haunted house, gather as much treasure as possible, and escape with his life. The original game was taught from a 1980's book called "Write your own adventure programs for your microcomputer". After playing a finished version of the game on Applesoft Basic, we now have to interpret the game into our own, modern C++ version with all the original functionality, plus more.
